main_definition: Pertaining to an empire or the Roman Empire, as well as its characteristics of grandeur, power, or dominance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to an emperor or empire
meanings_and_examples.example: His imperial status granted him authority over other nobles.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Extremely grand and majestic in appearance, style, or manner
meanings_and_examples.example: The imperial palace was a breathtaking sight with its ornate architecture.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to the Roman Empire or the period of Roman history when it ruled over vast territories
meanings_and_examples.example: Imperial Rome is famous for its engineering feats, such as aqueducts and roads.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to an empire's military might and dominance in warfare
meanings_and_examples.example: The imperial army was renowned for their discipline and strength on the battlefield.
